name: Rapture Ride
description:
Welp. It's the end of the world. You've been so bad that Satan himself has given you the option to have a sweet victory ride to rapture. So pick a song and enjoy the view. Fly around maybe. Or don't touch anything. Just. Enjoy.

This is a rhythmic space rider. Quite possibly more of a music player than a game. The fire and demon hands move according to the beat of the music.

This was made in Construct 2. I would actually like to add the option for users to upload their own music to play during the ride but I couldn't get that working. If anyone knows how I can have a users music uploaded and analysed in Construct, please let me know. I don't plan on keeping any music in this. Why that would be illegal, wouldn't it?
